ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates the basics of the WaterfallDataSeries3D and WaterfallRenderableSeries3D types in SciChart
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates the basics of the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Model.DataSeries.Waterfall.WaterfallDataSeries3D%603.html']WaterfallDataSeries3D[/url] and [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20Waterfall%203D%20Chart%20Type.html']WaterfallRenderableSeries3D[/url].
This series allows rendering of many 3D Slices / mountain charts which can be used for visualizing spectrographic, audio or ECG data.
The Waterfall series colors and palette can be updated by supplying a [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.RenderableSeries.MeshColorPalette.html']MeshColorPalette[/url] which wraps a SolidColorBrush or LinearGradientBrush. Multiple options are available and usage of this series type is described in the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20Waterfall%203D%20Chart%20Type.html']Waterfall Chart Documentation[/url]
